creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
medium: Black chalk, watercolor, ink wash, and pastel on cream paper
portfolio: Les Amours d'un poète, bound portfolio
provenance: Louis Barthou (1862-1934), Paris; Fanny Icart (second wife of Louis Icart), Paris; (Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago); sold to MIA, 1999.
title: Study for Illustration to Les Amours d'un poète
